name: Saturday Morning RPG
blurb: Saturday Morning RPG is an episodic role-playing game set in a world inspired by 1980s Saturday morning cartoons.

rewards.reward: THE BASIC PACK: Every pledge gets your name in the game's credits. Even a dollar will help us out and you deserve credit for that! You'll be credited as a bronze level supporter, which means your name will be in the credits but it will be a small font size.
THE ADVANCED PACK: You'll get into the credits as a silver level supporter. Your name will be displayed bigger and in a different category than the bronze supporters.

THE TANGIBLE THANK YOU PACK: Handwritten postcard thanking you for your support. If we get enough of these, you can expect custom postcards. If not, you'll probably get some leftover Garfield Christmas postcards from several years ago. It doesn't mean we don't love you.\r\n\r\nYou'll also receive any previously listed rewards.

THE ADVANCED PACK: One Jackson earns you a premium spot in the credits and gold level supporter status. Bigger text, cooler font, and you'll get positioned before the other people. You can show your friends your name and pretend you worked on the game! Radical.\r\n\r\nYou'll also receive the aforementioned handwritten postcard.

THE PREORDER PACK: $25 will earn you a copy of the full game with all future content updates (episodes and other such things) given to you for free. You can pick the platform, but keep in mind we're launching on iOS first! (PC, Android, Mac, and Linux following at undetermined times). Along with your preorder, you'll also receive the postcard and platinum level credit.
THE POSTER PACK: You'll get an 11 x 17 poster print. It should be pretty awesome!\r\n\r\nYou'll also receive the postcard and platinum support credit.

THE "NOSTALGIC TASTEBUDS" PACK: You'll get a pack of Fruit Stripe Gum autographed by core team members! This is the most expensive pack of gum you'll ever buy! (or not buy!) Anyone pledging higher than $50 will also receive this reward. You'll also receive any lower level rewards at this level.

THE "PUT ME IN THE GAME" PACK: If you ever dreamed of being in digital space, with your picture we'll make a NPC (non-playable character) sprite after you with a spoken line of dialogue in the game!\r\n\r\nThis does not include the poster print or postcard but does still earn you a spot in the credits.

THE LIMITED EDITION PACK: You'll receive a limited edition paperback book containing the game's design document as well as the name in credits, poster, and postcard. This will only be available through Kickstarter!
THE TANGIBLE "PUT ME IN THE GAME" PACK: A pledge of $150 will earn you the in game NPC, spot in the credits, and all previous physical rewards.

THE USELESS UNIQUE RELIC PACK: You'll earn yourself a limited edition Saturday Morning RPG VHS tape containing completely unique contents (each tape has different contents). Unfortunately we won't burn this on a DVD for you, we're going retro here (unless you beg us too)! Of course, you'll also get all the previous rewards.

THE ADVANCED USELESS RELIC PACK: Get ready for some serious ear candy, because you'll be getting a limited edition cassette tape of the Saturday Morning RPG theme song recorded by Vince DiCola! No CDs or MP3s, we're pretty sure those weren't around in the 80's.\r\n\r\nYou'll also receive any previously listed rewards.

THE "PUT ME IN THE GAME AND MAKE ME IMPORTANT" PACK: You'll get placed into the game as an NPC and we'll make you integral to a side-quest. People won't be able to ignore you anymore! \r\n\r\nYou'll also receive any previously listed rewards.

THE DESIGNER PACK: Name an object, make up the power, and we'll put it into the game (within reason, legality, scope and our technical abilities). We'll work to make your dream a reality!


You'll also receive any previously listed rewards.

THE NOSTALGIA PACK: You'll receive a custom painted Saturday Morning RPG Nintendo Entertainment System. We will only be making two of these (one for the $1,500 reward and one for the $3,000 reward). Our whole team will also sign the console.\r\n\r\nYou'll also receive any previously listed rewards.

THE VILLAIN PACK: We'll make you into a key villain in the game. You will then end up as one of the game's boss encounters. We'll work with you during every step of the design process to ensure that you become the coolest and most awesome villain in the whole game.


You'll also receive any previously listed rewards (we'll even put you in the credits three times!).
